title: Message
description: Details related to message receiving and publishing if the captured event integrates with a messaging system

name.description: Name of the message queue where the message is received.
Topic name used for routing the message.

ms.description: The age of the message in milliseconds. If the instrumented messaging framework provides a timestamp for the message, agents may use it. Otherwise, the sending agent can add a timestamp in milliseconds since epoch UTC to the message's metadata to be retrieved by the receiving agent. If a timestamp is not available, agents should omit this field.

body.description: messsage body, similar to an http request body

headers.description: messsage headers, similar to http request headers
